Stock market performance: One aspect that was employed to verify the authenticity of the claim is the performance of the stock market. This includes analyzing factors such as stock indices, market capitalization, and overall trends in stock prices.
Industrial production: Another aspect considered is the level of industrial production. This includes assessing the output and productivity of various industries and sectors, such as manufacturing, mining, and utilities.
Consumer spending: The level of consumer spending is also taken into account. This involves evaluating the purchasing behavior and patterns of consumers, including their expenditure on goods and services.
Exports: The performance of exports is another aspect that was considered. This includes analyzing the volume and value of goods and services exported by a country, as well as assessing the competitiveness of its export industries.
